name: cca-moodle-styles
description: CCA custom Moodle styles (HTML, CSS, JS)

scripts.js: gulp addlhtml; cat build/footer.js | pbcopy; open 'https://moodle.cca.edu/admin/settings.php?section=additionalhtml#admin-additionalhtmlfooter'
scripts.jsd: gulp addlhtmlDev; cat build/footer.js | pbcopy; open 'https://moodle-stg-1.cca.edu/admin/settings.php?section=additionalhtml#admin-additionalhtmlfooter'
scripts.mobile: gulp mobile; if [ -n "$NS" ]; then kubectl -n $NS cp build/mobile.css $(kubectl -n $NS get pods -o custom-columns=name:.metadata.name | grep moodle):/bitnami/moodle/local; else echo 'no NS namespace env var, not pushing mobile.css to pod'; fi
